      • collisionCheck

        public static Utils.ClosestCollisionData collisionCheck(org.lwjgl.util.vector.Vector2f a,

                                        java.util.Collection<? extends com.fs.starfarer.api.combat.CombatEntityAPI> ignoreList,
                                        com.fs.starfarer.api.combat.CombatEngineAPI engine)
        Checks if the segment from a to b collides with an entity and returns the collision point closest to a. Returns null if there was no collision.
